attributes.action: Reduce the age for free bus passes to 60 for the whole of England.
attributes.additional_details: Reducing the qualifying age to 60 may increase the use of public transport thereby reducing the amount of cars on the roads, in turn, reducing polution.
attributes.background: Reduce the qualifying age for free bus travel to 60 for the whole of England in line with the rest of the United Kingdom.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552322
